body:
**Please explain the motivation behind the feature request.**
Goose can work for quite awhile (5+ minutes) on some complicated tasks. I usually want to get other work done during this, but I keep checking back to see if Goose is done working and I can look at the output, or give further instructions to Goose.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A Settings options to enable desktop notifications when Goose completes tasks.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
For now, I think just a single setting to notify when Goose is done. But, also could be a notification for each step, and also notifications badges or messaging sounds. Slack has good Notification options to look at for insipration.

- [x] I have verified this does not duplicate an existing feature request
title: Notifications
